description: Transitioned Diono's BigCommerce development in-house, leading site development, API auditing, and cross-functional coordination across seven global websites. Improved site speed and engagement by rebuilding core pages and removing bottlenecks. Additionally led development of a React Native safety app with multi-region support and offline access, nearly launching before company acquisition halted the project.

Sole developer behind the band's custom Next.js website, designed to automate content updates and eliminate manual maintenance. Built the full digital infrastructure—design mockups, domain setup, dual live/preview environments, and tech stack—to connect users with Spotify, YouTube, and Bandsintown. Focused on creating a maintainable, scalable, and budget-friendly solution aligned with the band’s long-term goals.

Responsible for managing and QA'ing multimedia lesson content using JSON configuration files and Git. Integrated video, slide, and audio assets across 35+ lessons while identifying logic errors and maintaining data consistency for final deployment in a structured content system.
